comments.comments_text: Goal! Alvaro Morata (Atl. Madrid) ran onto a clever lofted pass from Samuel Lino and easily beat the keeper with a header into the bottom right corner from close range. 1:0.

comments.comments_text: It looks like Koke (Atl. Madrid) saw red with that tackle. Javier Alberola Rojas won't tolerate such behaviour on the pitch and blows for a foul.

comments.comments_text: It's a goal! Antoine Griezmann (Atl. Madrid) bravely launches himself at a cross from Saul Niguez and gives Kepa Arrizabalaga no chance with a close-range bullet header into the bottom right corner. 2:0.

comments.comments_text: The ball rebounds and arrives at the feet of Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) just outside the box. He doesn't think twice and fires a brilliant shot into the bottom left corner. His attempt was beyond the reach of Jan Oblak. 2:1.
